Containers.Name: DemonSaw-Client
Containers.Description: Run a DemonSaw Client [br][br] [b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']Configuration[/span][/u][/b][br] [b]/share[/b] This is where the default share is..[br] [b]/nobody/Downloads[/b] This is where the files from DemonSaw are downloaded by default.[br] Launch the Web Interface at port 8080 to start DemonSaw.[br][br] [br][br] Submit any UnRaid issues here: [url]http://lime-technology.com/forum/index.php?topic=48370.0[/url]
Containers.Overview: Docker container to run a DemonSaw Client with web RDP access.
